Yes, there are many businesses that are taking a leadership role in addressing climate change. Here are some specific examples:

1. Unilever: This multinational consumer goods company has committed to achieving carbon neutrality by 2039 and sourcing 100% of its energy from renewable sources by 2030.

2. Tesla: This electric car company is working to reduce the world's dependence on fossil fuels by producing electric vehicles and promoting sustainable energy solutions.

3. IKEA: This furniture retailer has set a goal of becoming climate-positive by 2030 by reducing its carbon footprint and investing in renewable energy.

4. Patagonia: This outdoor clothing and gear company has been a leader in sustainability and has committed to becoming carbon-neutral by 2025.

5. Interface: This global carpet manufacturer is committed to becoming a carbon-negative company by 2040, meaning that it will remove more carbon from the atmosphere than it produces.

By supporting these and other environmentally responsible businesses, you can help create a more sustainable future.
